detail_desc: T-shirt in nepped cotton jersey with embroidery.
Short, boxy-style sports top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a stretch, jacquard-knit panel, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-breasted coat in soft pile with large notch lapels and front pockets. Lined.

Non-wired bra in lace with narrow decorative straps at the front and moulded, lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Straight-cut top in jersey crêpe with an opening and button at the back of the neck, lace yoke and short sleeves.

Shirt in washed linen with a grandad collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Metal earrings and ear cuffs in various designs decorated with glass rhinestones. The zinc content is recycled.
Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft organic cotton slub jersey with buttons at the back, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a flared skirt with patch front pockets.
Short jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back. Double layer at the top.
Tunic in soft jersey with a round neck, short dolman sleeves, a narrow adjustable tie belt under the bust, and a rounded hem.
Lightly padded, thermal jacket with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a hook and loop fastening. Zip down the front, side pockets and two inner pockets. Lined.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves, a zip down the front that continues down one leg and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports trousers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with taped details and an elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a pleat and ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and half-string back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, wrapover jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a textured-weave cotton blend containing some linen with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and leg pockets.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side panels and a small print on one leg. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a pocket with a taped zip at one side. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Coat in soft pile with narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Baby Exclusive. Fully lined, textured, patterned swimsuit.
Trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and soft faux fur pompom. Diameter 5 cm, length approx. 12 cm.
Dress in woven cotton with a collar, button placket and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a gathered yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Detachable imitation suede belt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with pleats at the top, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and tiers to the hem.
Shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with elastication, and a zip fly with buttons. Side pockets and wide legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets with a decorative flap and gently tapered legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Printed top with press-studs on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Shirt in an airy, patterned weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with side pockets. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton jersey with a collar, slits in the sides and no buttons.
Leggings in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Joggers in a stretch weave with a drawstring waist, low crotch and zip fly with a press-stud. Diagonal side pockets, zipped leg pockets, back pockets, and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.
Wide, shorter-style top in cotton jersey with cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a fake fly, front and back pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.

Short dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with gathers. Beaded embroidery around the neckline and waist and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Shorts in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend containing some wool with a stand-up collar, decorative buttons on one shoulder and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft, marled jersey with a chest pocket and raw, roll edges around the neckline and armholes.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, 3/4-length raglan sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Boxy, V-neck cardigan in a soft rib knit made from a cotton blend. Buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Shirt in cotton twill with a button-down collar with concealed buttons, a classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip at the front, side pockets and ribbed jersey sections under the arms. Lined.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and a chest pocket with a button. Detachable, braided belt, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length treggings in stretch twill with a high waist with decorative buttons at the sides, concealed zip in one side and slim legs.

Jacket in washed denim with a pile collar and press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets, a flap chest pocket with a press-stud, adjustable tabs with press-studs at the sides and press-studs at the cuffs. Pile lining.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back.
Soft jersey tops with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Large earrings in hammered metal with a plastic bead hung at the bottom. Length 5.5 cm.
Knee-length shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Sun hat in patterned, UV-protective fabric with ties under the chin. UPF 50.

Calf-length dress in jacquard-weave viscose with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, shoulder pads and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt. Lined.

Lace body with soft, triangular cups with removable inserts and decorative lace straps at the top and back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam under the bust with a narrow, adjustable strap at the back. High-cut legs and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine, airy knit containing glittery threads with an open back with satin ribbons at the bottom.
Top in a viscose crêpe weave with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Soft leather and suede pouch with a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Twill lining. Size 15x22 cm.

Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool decorated with artificial pearls. Double-layered polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Vertical chest pocket with a zip and taped detail, and discreet side pockets.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and a ribbed scalloped edge around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, fitted top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a shaped neckline front and back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Long-sleeved thermal top in marled jersey. Slim fit.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Long-sleeved swimsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, a zip at the top with a long tab, and a lined gusset. Lined at the front.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a boat neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and a long tie belt at the waist.
